secundum Exodum quinta generatione egressi sint filii Israhel
de terra Aegypti, tribus tibi IudaeIndae ordo numeretur: Iuda genuit
Phares, Phares genuit Esrom, Esrom genuit Aram, Aram genuit
Aminadab, Aminadab genuit Naasson, Naasson genuit Salmon.
